#summary What you need to already have installed on your machine.

For the files in this package to work successfully, it is assumed that you have
the following already installed on your computer:

  * A Windows machine (XP, Vista, 7, Server 2003 or Server 2008)
  * .NET Framework 2.0 or greater
  * IIS and ASP.NET (if you *don't* have these installed already, they can be installed via Microsoft's [http://www.microsoft.com/web/downloads/platform.aspx Web Platform installer])
